staffMembers.name: Rajesh Kumar
staffMembers.bio: Dr. Rajesh Kumar has over 55 years of teaching experience in Physics. He specializes in making complex concepts easy to understand through practical demonstrations.

staffMembers.name: Priya Sharma
staffMembers.bio: Mrs. Priya Sharma brings mathematics to life with her innovative teaching methods. She has helped numerous students excel in competitive exams.

staffMembers.name: Amit Patel
staffMembers.bio: Mr. Amit Patel is known for his engaging chemistry experiments and clear explanations. He holds a master's degree in Chemistry from IIT.

staffMembers.name: Neha Verma
staffMembers.bio: Ms. Neha Verma is passionate about literature and language. She leads the school's debating club and annual literary festival.

staffMembers.name: Rahul Mehta
staffMembers.bio: Mr. Rahul Mehta is an expert in programming and web development. He has introduced several tech initiatives in the school.

staffMembers.name: Arjun Singh
staffMembers.bio: Mr. Arjun Singh is a former state-level athlete who now trains students in various sports. He has coached several district-level champions.

staffMembers.name: Meera Gupta
staffMembers.bio: Mrs. Meera Gupta has a deep love for Hindi literature and language. She organizes cultural events and poetry competitions.

staffMembers.name: Arun Reddy
staffMembers.bio: Dr. Arun Reddy specializes in botanical sciences and maintains the school's botanical garden. He promotes environmental awareness.

staffMembers.name: Vikram Malhotra
staffMembers.bio: Mr. Vikram Malhotra makes history and civics engaging through storytelling and interactive sessions. He organizes educational field trips.

staffMembers.name: Ananya Desai
staffMembers.bio: Mrs. Ananya Desai is dedicated to preserving classical language and culture. She conducts Sanskrit drama and recitation programs.

staffMembers.name: Karthik Iyer
staffMembers.bio: Mr. Karthik Iyer brings real-world economics into the classroom. He leads the school's business and entrepreneurship club.

staffMembers.name: Deepika Menon
staffMembers.bio: Ms. Deepika Menon is a professional artist who nurtures creativity in students. She organizes the annual art exhibition and workshops.
